Recology is a blog about open science, and using R for ecology and evolution.


Pascal Mickelson

Pascal Mickelson is a Post-doctoral Research Associate in the College of Optical Sciences Department at University of Arizona in Tucson, AZ.




           

Scott Chamberlain

Scott Chamberlain is a postdoctoral fellow in the Biology Department at Simon Fraser University in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada.
